DDSQLtools 1.2.0

Reference

All functions

DDSQLtools

DDSQLtools: Wrappers for DemoTools Functions to Work with UNPD SQL Internal Data Format

DDSQLtools.data

DDSQLtools test data - Egypt 2006 - Population by age and sex

do_compare()

Wrapper for Population Comparison

do_extrapolate()

Wrapper for Extrapolating Old-Age Human Mortality Data Using Various Mortality Models ("laws")

do_heaping()

Wrapper for Age-Heaping Methods

do_lifetable()

Wrapper for Life Table Methods

do_qualitychecks()

Wrapper for Performing Age-Sex Male-Female Data Quality Checks

do_smoothing()

Wrapper for Smoothing Populations in 5-year Age Groups

do_splitting()

Wrapper for Age-Splitting Methods

get_dataprocess()

Get information about available data-types (DataProcessTypeID)

get_indicators()

Get information about available indicators (IndicatorTypeID)

get_locations()

Get information about available locations (LocID)

get_locationtypes()

Get information about available location types (LocAreaTypeID)

get_recorddata()

Download data from UNPD portal

get_seriesdata()

Get information about available details for a given series of data

get_subgroups()

Get information about available sub-group-types (SubGroupTypeID)

is_OAG()

Check whether the input data contains an open age interval
